price: ߜߙߊ߬ߢߐ߲߰ ߛߌ߫ ߕߴߏ߬ ߟߊ߫، ߒߠߋ ߟߐ߬ߣߍ߲߫ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߟߊ߫߸ ߒߠߋ ߟߋ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߖߘߍ߬ߞߟߏ߬ߦߊ߬ߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߝߟߐ ߘߌ߫
arabic: لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُۥۖ وَبِذَٰلِكَ أُمِرۡتُ وَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lā sharīka lahu wabidhālika umir'tu wa-anā awwalu al-mus'limīna
